title: A letter of a yonge gentylman named mayster Germen Gardynare, wryten to a frend of his, wherin men may se the demeanour [and] heresy of Ioh[a]n Fryth late burned, [and] also the dyspycyo[n]s [and] reasonynge vpon the same, had betwene the same mayster Germen and hym.
author: Gardynare, Germen.
publisher: Prented by w. Rastell in Fletestrete in saynt Brydys chyrchyarde,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
